price: 8. Kami tidak menurunkan malaikat melainkan dengan kebenaran (untuk membawa azab) dan mereka ketika itu tidak diberikan penangguhan.
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā nunazzilu al-malāikata illā bil-ḥaqi wamā kānū idhan munẓarīna
